code: import{useEffect}from"react";import React,{useState}from"react";import"./prpoy.css";import{MapContainer,TileLayer,Popup,Marker}from'react-leaflet';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PrimerProyecto=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[animate,setAnimate]=useState('carga');useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setData(data);setLoading(false);setAnimate('carga-animate');}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching data:',error);setLoading(false);});});const diferencia=parseFloat((data.cases-data.recovered)/data.cases*100).toFixed(2);const position=[40,-4];if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Cargando..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"prp ".concat(animate?'carga-animate':'carga'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Estadisticas de covid"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mapa",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MapContainer,{center:position,zoom:6,scrollWheelZoom:false,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TileLayer,{attribution:"\xA9 OpenStreetMapcontributors",url:"https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Marker,{position:position,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Popup,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ol",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Casos: ",data.cases]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Muertes: ",data.deaths]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Recuperados: ",data.recovered]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Diferencia: ",diferencia,"% "]})]})})})]})})]});};export default PrimerProyecto;
